cause.description:
St. Jude Research Hospital has today's most gifted researchers making discoveries that have and will change treatments for cancer and various catastrophic diseases. St. Jude also freely shares all of its discoveries with hospitals around the world so they, too, can help patients with these diseases. No St. Jude patient is ever asked to pay for treatment, therefore making St. Jude America's third largest health-care charity, surving mainly on donations.
1. Delta Delta Delta sorority has adopted St. Jude Children's Research Hospital as their national philanthropy and plans to raise $7.5 million within 7 years.
2. College campuses around the United States can help raise money on their own or through St. Jude Up 'til Dawn, a college letter writing campaign.
